summary: Adds some trees and plants to Whiterun without causing performance issues or overdoing it.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]I tried to find a good Whiterun overhaul that doesn't add too much and doesn't give players advantages but simply couldn't find any i would like so i created this mod.

[/size]This mod adds various trees and plants and alchemy resources to Whiterun without overdoing it nor adding freebies.
Also the Whiterun city wall height was increased to prevent sight of ugly empty landscape surrounding Whiterun. The archer towers now have doors that can be lockpicked and towers can be accessed.

[b][size=3]Update 1.1:[/size][/b]

All tower doors can now be lockpicked and players can use them to access the towers. Moved some foliage from busier spots to emptier spots. Technically object count has not Â been increased.

[b][size=3]Recommended mods:[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141]Skyrim flora overhaul[/url] for extra plants.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7522]New grass for Whiterun[/url] for greener groundcover. I used option 1 in my screenshots.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51069]Realistic aspen trees[/url] to make aspens more colorful.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936]Realvision ENB[/url] to make everything look much more saturated and nicer.

[b][size=3]Compatibility:[/size][/b]
Not compatible with most Whiterun changing mods that add buildings and objects outdoors. Compatible with trees in cities mod.

[b][size=3]Credits:
[/size][/b] Vurt for SFO lupines.
author: Laacis2
